name: Puzzles: All-In-One
description:
We've combined all of our puzzles into one app.

Features:
• No Ads!
• 10 games in one!
• 87006 (yes, 87 thousands) unique levels with unique solution!
• No Internet connection required, you can play offline!
• Day and Night modes!

Games:
• Battleships
• Suguru
• Futoshiki
• Kropki
• Binary
• No Four In A Row
• Sudoku X
• Sudoku
• Hexoku
• Camping
